response: {"message": "Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product, which has been meticulously designed to meet your needs and exceed your expectations. With its cutting-edge features and unparalleled quality, this product is truly a game-changer in its field. I believe it could significantly enhance your operations or personal endeavors. Considering its exceptional value and benefits, I am extending an exclusive offer to you. For a limited time, you have the opportunity to acquire this product at a special price of $15,000. This is a fantastic opportunity to secure a high-quality asset at a competitive rate. If you're interested, please let me know, and we can proceed with the transaction.", "product_price": 15000}
